categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The Taroonian Civil War was a twenty-year long conflict fought between the neighboring planets of Kuan and Bordal in the Taroon system. The conflict claimed many lives and created a constant state of warfare within the Outer Rim Territories system. It was brought to an end by the arrival of Imperial-class Star Destroyer Vengeance, commanded by Admiral Mordon, which instituted martial law and began the disarmament process.
